price: 96. Ye nde azali kobimisa pole ya ntongo na molili ya butu mpe atia butu ezala bopemi, kasi moyi na sanza тропа koyeba motango. Oyo nde mokano ya Nkolo nguya atonda boyebi.
arabic: فَالِقُ ٱلۡإِصۡبَاحِ وَجَعَلَ ٱلَّيۡلَ سَكَنٗا وَٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَ حُسۡبَانٗاۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقۡدِيرُ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡعَلِيمِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fāliqu al-iṣ'bāḥi wajaʿala al-layla sakanan wal-shamsa wal-qamara ḥus'bānan dhālika taqdīru al-ʿazīzi al-ʿalīmi
